servinfo.title: Excessive nitrogen oxides (NOx) emission
servinfo.ptxt: Perform troubleshooting referring to the followings when ECM has detected no DTC and no abnormality has been found in Visual Inspection and Engine Basic Inspection .

action.ptxt: Check for absence of filler neck restrictor.

ps.ptxt: Closed loop system (A/F feedback compensation) fails (Faulty TP sensor, Poor performance of ECT sensor or MAF sensor)

action.ptxt: Electric Throttle Body Assembly On-Vehicle Inspection , Engine Coolant Temperature (ECT) Sensor Inspection or Mass Air Flow (MAF) and Intake Air Temperature (IAT) Sensor Inspection

ptxt.intxref: Electric Throttle Body Assembly On-Vehicle Inspection

ps.ptxt: Faulty accelerator pedal position (APP) sensor assembly

ptxt.intxref: Accelerator Pedal Position (APP) Sensor Assembly Inspection

ps.ptxt: Camshaft position control (VVT) system out of order (for M16 engine)

ptxt.intxref: Oil Control Valve Inspection:For M16A Engine with VVT
